column3: 55. In  view  of  the  findings  of  this  Court  with  regard  to  the  questions  in  respect  of

of  the  Court  of  Appeal  cannot  stand,  and  is  therefore  set  aside.  The  Petition

column2: 57. In the circumstances of this case, no order is made with regard to costs.
